--- title: Week of WebCamp - Wednesday Schedule layout: visitors ---

Frontman / JS / Ruby / Python Meetup Schedule

Wednesday, October 1st @ HGK, Nova cesta 3-7

  • A joint meetup held by the following user groups: FrontmanHR, JavaScript Zagreb, Python HR, Ruby Zagreb
  • Please RSVP at one of the above linked group pages (except FrontmanHR)
  • Groups will initially get the same amount of tickets to share, so see where you will find some space left to RSVP

Note: This is a preliminary schedule, changes in the order of talks are still possible.

Track A Track B
15:00 Doors Open & Gathering
15:30 Josip Maslać: Desktop first, responsive later - naučene lekcije Ivan Mesic: Log your (apps) brains out
16:00 Darko Kukovec: Conquering CSS debugging Deni Bertovic: Python Metaclasses for fun and profit
16:30 Coffee Break (15 min)
16:45 Martina Jović: Sustainable web design Damir Svrtan: Building a bidirectional web framework in Ruby
17:15 Hrvoje Gazibara: Visualizing data on the Web Bruno Sutic: Deploying Rails app with Capistrano
17:45 Darko Ronić: Mobile games to the Cloud with Python Jan Varljen: Continuous Integration process with Ruby On Rails
18:15 Coffee & Networking Break (30 min)
18:45 Andrej Radišić: Ministry of sound case study Senko Rašić: Detecting duplicate queries in Django ORM
19:15 Tomislav Mesić: Decoupling Your HTML, CSS, and JavaScript Robert Lujo: Development environment for Django project - my way
19:45 Closing / Casual drinkup @ Pivnica Medvedgrad Adžijina (20h)
